title: Lauren's Promise
description: When University of Utah athlete Lauren McCluskey is found murdered on campus, investigators learn that she had reached out to the campus police for help multiple times before her death. Josh Mankiewicz has chosen this episode as one of his most memorable episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
